nodes.text: Vix was a male Human merchant who sold weapons at the Senate Commercial District on Coruscant during the Cold War.

Vix (Human) appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendor for Republic players on Coruscant. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Vix was removed from the game along with the rest of the Weapons Vendors.
